document_data.mainbody:
Brahiirs Street was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Brahiirs Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeeps North Ward. The road ran diagonally in between Suldown Street in the northeast just one building west of the intersection with Nindabar Street, and Gelthoon Street in the southwest. Catchthief Alley connected with the southern end of Brahiirs Street.
